comments.en:
Multi-function device: Printer, Scanner, Copier.

The printing engine is the one of the Epson Stylus C64, see that printer entry for more info.

Scanning seems not to work with the "epson" backend of SANE, so up to now this device does not scan with free software. Therefore this printer is listed as "Partially" working for now.

Copying should just work with the front panel of the device.
